mapper.select: SELECT c.id examId, c.survey_name examName, d.subject_name subjectName, c.survey_qu_num surveyQuNum, e.user_name createName, f.grade_name gradeName FROM school_student_mation a, exam_survey_class b, exam_survey_directory c LEFT JOIN school_subject_mation d ON c.subject_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff e ON c.create_id = e.user_id LEFT JOIN school_grade_mation f ON c.grade_id = f.id WHERE a.id = #{stuId} AND a.now_class_id = b.class_id AND c.id = b.exam_survey_id AND c.survey_state = '1' AND c.id NOT IN ( SELECT k.survey_id FROM exam_survey_answer k WHERE k.create_id = #{stuId} ) ORDER BY c.real_start_time DESC

SELECT c.id examId, c.survey_name examName, c.fraction examFraction, d.subject_name subjectName, c.survey_qu_num surveyQuNum, e.user_name createName, g.id answerId, g.state, CASE g.state WHEN '1' THEN '待阅卷' WHEN '2' THEN '已阅卷' ELSE '未知' END stateName, g.total_time totalTime, DATE_FORMAT(g.bg_an_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') bgAnDate, DATE_FORMAT(g.end_an_date,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') endAnDate, g.mark_fraction markFraction, f.grade_name gradeName FROM school_student_mation a, exam_survey_directory c LEFT JOIN school_subject_mation d ON c.subject_id = d.id LEFT JOIN sys_eve_user_staff e ON c.create_id = e.user_id LEFT JOIN school_grade_mation f ON c.grade_id = f.id, exam_survey_answer g WHERE a.id = #{stuId} AND a.id = g.create_id AND c.id = g.survey_id ORDER BY c.real_start_time DESC
